medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Lethargy and fevers began with a syncopal episode yesterday, leading to hypotension measured at 65/37 this morning. The patient has a history of being severely demented and could not provide further information.
medical_history.past_medical_history: 1. Coronary artery disease status post coronary artery bypass graft. 2. Cervical spondylosis. 3. Prostate cancer - 'watchful waiting'. 4. BPH status post prostatectomy. 5. Degenerative joint disease. 6. Hypothyroidism. 7. Sleep apnea. 8. Alzheimer's dementia. 9. Recent left eye surgery complicated by endophthalmitis.
medical_history.family_history: Mother - Congestive heart failure. Father - died at an unspecified age, no history of syncope or arrhythmia.
